quote_last: , change at Doncaster and Peterborough. You should be back in Cambridge just after midnight.”
title: Dougie Mortimer's Right Arm
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: . People were lining up at the loading door, which meant that a bus was expected.
title: The Far Side of the Dollar
author: Ross MacDonald
